name: MS OWA Outlook Web App Dark Mode
description: Dark mode (aka Night mode, aka Dark skin, aka Night skin) for Microsoft Outlook Web App.
additional_info:
The css was mostly automatically generated from original css files. I tried to preserve as much of "meaningful" colors (e.g. green to mean user is online), while all other colors are inverted.

2016-05-07
Note: doesn't support the Exchange 2016 server.
